description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Battle Bees is an arena battle game for up to 8 players online, featuring both deathmatch and objective based game modes. Customise your avatar's own bee and battle it out against the AI in single player wave defense mode, or take on your friends with up to 4 player local and up to 8 player online combat!
